backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing a wedding photography/videography platform with portfolio management (videos/photos by category), booking system, package management, user profiles, homepage/sitewide content, special moment galleries, and role-based access control using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: unified admin dashboard page creation, routing configuration updates, AdminGuard component backend integration, and Layout component admin link addition, all with high confidence and mapped to test requirements REQ-27 through REQ-30.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, and hooks describing the React application structure including routing, admin pages, public pages, reusable components, and React Query hooks for backend integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space for consistent design tokens across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point, loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with all public routes (home, videos, special-moments, booking) and admin routes (dashboard, orders, content, packages, special-moments, homepage, categories, sitewide-content) wrapped with AdminGuard, plus ThemeProvider, ProfileSetup, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingAct: Admin action buttons for managing bookings including approve/reject, status updates, and photographer assignment via principal ID. Uses dropdown menu and dialog for interactions.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingTab: Table component displaying booking details (customer, email, package, date, status, photographer) with status badges and action buttons for each booking row.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMe: Form for editing display names and descriptions for three gallery categories (Weddings, Pre-Wedding, Receptions). Loads current metadata and updates all categories on submit.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageCo: Form for editing homepage hero section content including title, subtitle, button text, and background image upload with progress tracking. Supports image upload via ExternalBlob.
Displays a grid of videos or photos with controls to delete items and toggle featured status. Uses alert dialogs for delete confirmation and shows category badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaUploa: Form component for uploading videos or photos with title, category selection, and file input. Handles file conversion to ExternalBlob and displays upload progress.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackageFor: Form for creating or editing service packages with fields for name, description, price, and video/photo type checkbox. Handles BigInt price conversion.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackageLis: Table view of all packages with edit and delete actions. Opens a dialog with PackageForm for editing and uses alert dialog for delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SitewideCo: Form for editing sitewide text content including services description, booking intro, and footer content. Loads current content from props and updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpecialMom: Form for creating special moment galleries with date, title, description, and photo selection. Displays available photos in a scrollable grid with checkboxes for multi-select.
Displays a table of special moment galleries with date, title, description, and photo count. Shows loading spinner or empty state when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that verifies user authentication via Internet Identity and admin status via backend isCallerAdmin query, redirecting non-authenticated users to home and showing access denied alert for authenticated non-admins with loading states during verification.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: A form component for submitting booking requests with fields for customer name, email, package selection, and event date. Uses React Query mutations to create bookings and displays toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: A filter component that displays category buttons (All, Weddings, Pre-Wedding, Receptions) with active state styling. Fetches category metadata from the backend and provides fallback labels if metadata is unavailable.
Displays featured videos and photos in grid layouts with category badges and hover effects. Shows up to 3 featured videos and 6 featured photos, with a fallback message when no featured content exists.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: A hero section component with customizable title, subtitle, button text, and background image. Features a gradient overlay and two call-to-action buttons for booking and viewing work.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header navigation, mobile menu, footer with social links, and conditional admin dashboard access. Integrates authentication state and sitewide content from backend.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states. Clears React Query cache on logout and handles authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/PackageCard.tsx: Displays a photography or videography package in a card format with icon, name, price, description, and selection button. Formats bigint prices and distinguishes between video and photo packages.
frontend/src/components/PhotoCard.tsx: A photo card component with category badge and hover effects that opens a full-size image in a dialog when clicked. Displays photo title and converts category codes to readable labels.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without profiles to enter their name and email. Prevents dismissal until profile setup is complete and uses React Query to save profile data.
frontend/src/components/SpecialMomentGal: Displays a clickable card for a special moment gallery with preview image, title, date, description, and photo count. Includes hover effects and gradient overlays.
Modal dialog component that displays all photos within a special moment gallery in a responsive grid layout with gallery title, date, and description.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card component that displays a video with native controls, category badge, and title. Includes hover effects and category label mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality and authentication status tracking. Includes provider component and custom hook for accessing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, videos, photos, packages, bookings, galleries, and content management. Provides both query and mutation hooks with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom wedding photography theme colors (rose-gold, champagne, ivory) in both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard landing page with navigation cards to all admin sections including orders, content, galleries, packages, homepage, categories, and sitewide content management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CategoryManagem: Admin page for customizing category metadata including display names and descriptions for gallery categories like Weddings, Pre-Wedding, and Receptions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContentManageme: Admin page with tabbed interface for uploading and managing videos and photos, displaying existing media in grids with upload forms.
frontend/src/pages/admin/HomepageManagem: Admin page for editing homepage hero section content including title, subtitle, call-to-action button text, and background image.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OrderManagement: Admin page displaying all bookings organized by status (pending, confirmed, completed, rejected) in tabbed tables with counts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PackageManageme: Admin page for creating and managing photography/videography packages with toggleable form and list view of existing packages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SitewideContent: Admin page for editing sitewide text content including services description, booking intro, and footer text.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SpecialMomentsM: Admin page for creating and managing date-organized special moment photo galleries with toggleable creation form and gallery list.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Booking page displaying photography and videography packages in tabs with package cards and a booking request form. Allows pre-selecting packages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, services overview (photography/videography cards), and featured galleries for both photos and videos. Uses dynamic content from backend.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentsPage.ts: Public-facing page displaying photo galleries filtered by category or organized by date, with toggle between category view (individual photos) and date view (special moment galleries).
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Public-facing page displaying video portfolio with category filtering, showing video cards in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (using OKLCH color space), typography, container settings, border radius, shadows, and animations for a cinematic wedding photography theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a photography/videography booking website with public galleries, customer booking system, and Internet Identity-protected admin panel for managing orders, content, and packages.
